name: débutant baby set
notes:
this extremely simple one-skein baby set is suitable for absolute beginner knitters. all you need to know to complete the project is how to cast on, knit, purl and bind off.

the matching pixie bonnet and legwarmers are both adorable and practical for new babies and would make a great last-minute gift.

>***have you cast on this pattern?*** we love to see your projects! tag your photos on instagram with **#mysweetpaprikaproject** for a chance to win a **$25 gift card** in our monthly giveaway. see details [here][1].

**sizes**
0-3 (3-6, 6-12) months

**finished measurements**
**legwarmers**
circumference: 5 (6, 7)"
length: 5 (5½, 6½)"

**bonnet**
height: 5½ (6¼, 7)"
depth: 5¼ (6, 6½)"

**yarn**
worsted weight yarn: 110 (140, 180) yds total for the set
50 (65, 90 yds for the legwarmers only
60 (75, 90) yds for the bonnet only

size 6-12 months shown in [sweet paprika andante][2] (100% superwash merino wool; 110g/ 195 yds), 1 (1, 1) skein canneberge.

**needles**
size 7 (4.5mm) needles, or size needed to obtain gauge.

**notions**
yarn needle

**gauge**
19 sts and 27 rows = 4" in stockinette stitch, after blocking.


  [1]: https://bit.ly/sp-iggivaway
  [2]: https://www.sweetpaprikadesigns.com/products/andante-worsted-weight?utm_source=ravelry&utm_medium=pattern&utm_campaign=rav
